title: Why is there not a highway exit at the intersection of college and I-140?
text:
Here's a link to a similar questions we've answered, because we do
not have the resources to inquire about every traffic signage issue.
If you'd like to see more signage on highways, contacting the NCDOT
is your best move. Their contact information is included in this link.
Thanks!

http://www.myreporter.com/?p=3242
